InstructionData.Title: LIFE4 - Life Support
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Life Support 1.0 https://github.com/dtandersen/sta alias GasSensor d0 alias O2Valve d1 alias CO2Valve d2 alias N2Valve d3 alias Unused d4 alias Unused d5
alias device r0 # device to control alias partial r1 # partial pressure alias ratio r2 # ratio of gas in room alias pressure r3 # room pressure alias poweron r4 alias setpoint r5 alias temp1 r9 alias temp2 r10 alias temp3 r11 alias error r14 alias rate r15
define maxPressure 101.325 define o2Target 0.20 # o2 ratio define co2Target 0.02 # co2 ratio define n2Target 0.78 # n2 ratio define kp 5 #s GasSensor On 1
start: yield
l pressure GasSensor Pressure
# oxygen regulation move r0 1 # o2 mul setpoint o2Target maxPressure l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen mul partial ratio pressure # pp of o2 s db Setting partial jal calcpid jal setpump
# co2 regulation move r0 2 # co2 mul setpoint co2Target maxPressure l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul partial ratio pressure # pp of co2 jal calcpid jal setpump
# nitrogen regulation move r0 3 # n2valve mul setpoint n2Target maxPressure l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen mul partial ratio pressure # pp of co2 jal calcpid jal setpump j start
calcpid: # global: sp, partial, kp sub error setpoint partial mul rate kp error # global rate j ra
setpump: # global: rate - pid output # global: pressure/maxPressure sgtz temp1 rate # rate > 0 slt temp2 pressure maxPressure # pressure < max and poweron temp1 temp2 s dr0 On poweron s dr0 Setting rate j ra
